channel.title: Questions about Kicksecure
channel.description:
I'm using Kicksecure and I have three questions.
Is there any way to watch Amazon Prime Video on Kicksecure?
When I connect my smartphone to Kicksecure, it doesn't recognize it. How do I get it to work?
I can't use the free wifi like in airports, the kind that doesn't have a password but gives you a login page. How do I get it to work?

item.title: Questions about Kicksecure
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
rhek:

Is there any way to watch Amazon Prime Video on Kicksecure?

I didn’t try and probably won’t. But most should work as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

rhek:

When I connect my smartphone to Kicksecure, it doesn’t recognize it. How do I get it to work?

Try first as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle. Then if required:

Whonix – 1 Mar 21

Bug Reports, Software Development and Feature Requests

How to Report (Security) Bugs in the Whonix ™ Operating System. Software development cycle, patches, and responsiveness to feedback and feature requests.

rhek:

I can’t use the free wifi like in airports, the kind that doesn’t have a password but gives you a login page. How do I get it to work?

Also probably nothing Kicksecure specific. Also https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

Read full topic
